name: ma_eventcode
sql:
(eventcode) -> multiIf (
      eventcode = 'I',
      'Init',
      eventcode = 'S',
      'Play Start',
      eventcode = 'P',
      'Playing',
      eventcode = 'H',
      'Heart Beat',
      eventcode = 'C',
      'Complete',
      eventcode = 'E',
      'Error',
      eventcode = 'V',
      'Visit',
      eventcode = 'F',
      'Feedback',
      eventcode
    )
